abstract: Presents a popover tip on the modified view.

declaration.code: @preconcurrency nonisolated func popoverTip(_ tip: (any Tip)?, arrowEdge: Edge? = nil, action: @escaping @MainActor (Tips.Action) -> Void = { _ in }) -> some View

overview:
### Discussion

Use this modifier to present a tip as a popover on an existing view when the tip becomes eligible for display.

items.description: Sets the tip’s view background to a style. Currently this only applies to inline tips, not popover tips.
